file.name: dashboard.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
    description: "{{.Description}}"
    title: Pipeline Dashboard API
    contact:
        email: info@banzaicloud.com
    license:
        name: Apache 2.0
        url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
    version: 0.3.0
paths:
    "/dashboard/{orgid}/clusters":
        get:
            security:
                - bearerAuth: []
            description: returns dashboard metrics for selected/all clusters of an organization
            tags:
                - dashboard
            summary: Get Dashboard info for all clusters of an organization
            parameters:
                - description: Organization ID
                  name: orgid
                  in: path
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      type: integer
            responses:
                "200":
                    description: OK
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/dashboard.GetDashboardResponse"
                "206":
                    description: Partial Content
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/dashboard.GetDashboardResponse"
                "400":
                    description: Bad Request
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/common.ErrorResponse"
    "/dashboard/{orgid}/clusters/{id}":
        get:
            security:
                - bearerAuth: []
            description: returns dashboard metrics for selected cluster
            tags:
                - dashboard
            summary: Get Dashboard info for a cluster
            parameters:
                - description: Organization ID
                  name: orgid
                  in: path
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      type: integer
                - description: C~luster ID
                  name: id
                  in: path
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      type: integer
            responses:
                "200":
                    description: OK
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/dashboard.GetDashboardResponse"
                "206":
                    description: Partial Content
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/dashboard.GetDashboardResponse"
                "400":
                    description: Bad Request
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/common.ErrorResponse"
servers:
    - url: //{.Host}{.BasePath}
      variables:
          .Host:
              default: unknown
          .BasePath:
              default: unknown
components:
    schemas:
        common.ErrorResponse:
            type: object
            properties:
                code:
                    type: integer
                error:
                    type: string
                message:
                    type: string
        dashboard.Allocatable:
            type: object
            properties:
                cpu:
                    type: string
                ephemeralStorage:
                    type: string
                memory:
                    type: string
                pods:
                    type: integer
        dashboard.Capacity:
            type: object
            properties:
                cpu:
                    type: string
                ephemeralStorage:
                    type: string
                memory:
                    type: string
                pods:
                    type: integer
        dashboard.ClusterInfo:
            type: object
            properties:
                cloud:
                    type: string
                clusterGroup:
                    type: string
                cpuUsagePercent:
                    type: number
                createdAt:
                    type: string
                creatorId:
                    type: integer
                creatorName:
                    type: string
                distribution:
                    type: string
                endpoint:
                    type: string
                secretName:
                    type: string
                id:
                    type: string
                location:
                    type: string
                masterVersion:
                    type: string
                memoryUsagePercent:
                    type: number
                name:
                    type: string
                nodePools:
                    type: object
                nodes:
                    type: array
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/dashboard.Node"
                project:
                    type: string
                region:
                    type: string
                resourceGroup:
                    type: string
                status:
                    type: string
                statusMessage:
                    type: string
                storageUsagePercent:
                    type: number
        dashboard.GetDashboardResponse:
            type: object
            properties:
                clusters:
                    type: array
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/dashboard.ClusterInfo"
        dashboard.Node:
            type: object
            properties:
                creationTimestamp:
                    type: string
                name:
                    type: string
                status:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/dashboard.Status"
        dashboard.Status:
            type: object
            properties:
                allocatable:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/dashboard.Allocatable"
                capacity:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/dashboard.Capacity"
                cpuUsagePercent:
                    type: number
                diskPressure:
                    type: string
                frequentUnregisterNetDevice:
                    type: string
                instanceType:
                    type: string
                kernelDeadlock:
                    type: string
                lastHeartbeatTime:
                    type: string
                memoryPressure:
                    type: string
                memoryUsagePercent:
                    type: number
                networkUnavailable:
                    type: string
                outOfDisk:
                    type: string
                pidPressure:
                    type: string
                ready:
                    type: string
                storageUsagePercent:
                    type: number

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /dashboard/{orgid}/clusters/{id}: get: security: unknown security schema "bearerAuth"
